Please include a summary of the changes and the related issue.

## Type of Change

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Refactoring (no functional changes)

## Checklist

- [ ] I have run `./scripts/lint-all.sh` and fixed all issues
- [ ] I have run `./scripts/run-tests.sh` and all tests pass
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] Code coverage remains at 75% or higher
- [ ] I have updated the documentation (if needed)
- [ ] My code follows the project's code style (ktlint, detekt, SwiftLint)

Please describe the tests that you ran to verify your changes:

- [ ] Unit tests
- [ ] Integration tests
- [ ] Manual testing
